title: WTB Rube Waddell - Portrait or Throwing
author: ternst17

posts.post_title: WTB Rube Waddell - Portrait or Throwing
posts.post_content: I’m looking to add a Rube Waddell to my T206 set. Open to either the portrait or throwing. Budget is up to $500 for the right card, so probably looking at lower grade. I also have a few T213-2 Coupon cards I’d be open to trading.
